column4: i just installed feity fawn, but some keyboard keys (mainly single and double quotes ' ") don't work unless I follow them with a click on spacebar !! anybody knows a solution ?
I changed the keyboard layout, but that didn solve the problem. Do I have to logout, or restart for changes to apply ?
Good question. I don't really know but a restart of X is always an option. Or maybe just do a killall nautilus?
